opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Wilkinson, Director, Ohio Department of Rehabilitation and Correction v. Austin

opinion:
544 U.S. 903

WILKINSON, DIRECTOR, OHIO DEPARTMENT OF REHABILITATION AND CORRECTION, ET AL.
v.
AUSTIN ET AL.

No. 04-495.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 7, 2005.

1

C. A. 6th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 543 U.S. 1032.] Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
